location.subtitle: The View, Stoumont
location.heading: A Hidden Gem in the Heart of Nature
location.description:
Perched atop an isolated hill in the Belgian Ardennes, The View offers unrivaled privacy and breathtaking panoramic views. Our unique location at the edge of the Parc Naturel des Sources ensures you are surrounded by preserved wild nature while enjoying all the comfort of premium accommodations.

From your private terrace, admire the sunrise painting the valleys in golden hues, or relax in the evening as the forest comes alive with the sounds of nature. The View is more than just a place to stay: it's a gateway to reconnect with nature.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about your stay

amenities.question: What amenities does The View offer?
amenities.answer: The View offers a private sauna, outdoor Nordic bath, indoor hot tub, breathtaking views, and a full smart home experience, including a romance mode with personalized lighting and music.

capacity.question: How many people can stay at The View?
capacity.answer: The lodge is designed for a maximum of two people, offering the perfect setting for an intimate and romantic retreat. We also welcome babies and children.

pets.question: Can I bring my pet?
pets.answer: Pets are not allowed due to allergy concerns and to ensure the comfort of all our guests.

kids.question: Can I bring my child?
kids.answer: Babies and children under 12 are welcome but must be announced at the time of booking.

booking.question: How can I book my stay at The View?
booking.answer: You can check availability and book your stay directly on our website, theviewlodge.be/#book

essentials.question: Do I need to bring essentials with me?
essentials.answer: No, we think of everything for you 😌. The View provides all necessary toiletries, towels, and bed linens to ensure a pleasant and hassle-free stay. The kitchen also has some Nespresso pods, dishwasher tablets, and basic spices.

yearRound.question: Is The View accessible year-round?
yearRound.answer: Yes, The View is open all year, offering unique experiences in each season, from cozy winters to sunny summer getaways.

activities.question: What activities are available nearby?
activities.answer: You can enjoy hiking trails that start directly from the lodge in the Parc des Sources. Additionally, the lodge is 5 minutes from La Gleize, 15 minutes from Plopsa Coo, 20 minutes from Spa (thermal baths, restaurants), and 25 minutes from the Francorchamps circuit.

privacy.question: How private is the location?
privacy.answer: The cabin is the last home perched on top of a hill, located right at the edge of the nature park, offering perfect privacy and tranquility.

kitchen.question: What is included in the kitchen?
kitchen.answer: The kitchen is fully equipped with all the essentials for cooking, including a microwave, traditional oven, dishwasher, large fridge & freezer, induction hob, and some Nespresso pods, dishwasher tablets, and basic spices.

publicTransport.question: Is public transport available to reach The View?
publicTransport.answer: Yes, The View is accessible by public transport. We are a 5-minute walk from the TEC Stoumont Targnon bus stop, served by line 142 (limited daily departures). This line takes you to several SNCB stations: Coo, Trois Ponts, and Aywaille, which offer easy access to Liège and Brussels with hourly trains on weekdays and every two hours on weekends. Contact us to see if arranging a transfer is possible.

fagnes.title: The Fagnes

fagnes.description: Explore the vast open landscapes of the Fagnes, a unique natural region near The View. Perfect for hiking and wildlife observation, its serene marshes and panoramic views offer a true escape into nature.

parcDesSources.subtitle: Nature at Your Doorstep

ninglinspo.description: Discover the stunning beauty of Ninglinspo, Belgium's most spectacular river. Follow the scenic hiking trail along waterfalls and through dramatic rock formations in this protected natural area.

dynamicPricing.heading: Our Pricing Approach
dynamicPricing.text:
At The View, we believe in fair and transparent pricing. Our rates naturally fluctuate based on demand, season, and availability.

This means you can often find great value by booking during quieter periods, while high season periods reflect the higher demand for our exclusive wellness retreat. We aim to reward flexible travelers with better rates, while ensuring everyone receives the same quality and service.
